Background

Kelly is part of the marketing track at Boston Startup School. After graduating from Babson College in 2009, Kelly worked in her family business, Broadstone Advisors, as well as Bank of America and HubSpot. Kelly is currently seeking a marketing or product evangelist role at an exciting Boston area startup. In her free time, Kelly is busy with the Junior League of Boston, walking rescue dogs at the MSPCA, and forcing her new dessert creations on family and friends (much to their delight).
